title: Where do I submit this?
body:
I'm sorry if I sound sensitive, but she fucking passed away recently.

I complained about Shyvana not getting stunned when I E'd her into a wall with Poppy, but she said this.

replies.body: You were toxic. you swore at him. Naughty, naughty.
Don't put me in the corner daddy.

Sorry for your loss, I imagine it must be quite difficult. If you're ever in need of help I'm sure the community would be more than willing to provide.

But on to your question, the best place to report stuff like that is through a [player support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I don't know if the situation with your mother will play any part in the judgement of the ban though, that's something you'll have to ask player support yourself.

If anything, it's still pretty toxic.

I mean Dunkey got banned for it.

But thank you.

> [{quoted}](name=Tele,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=nihIumoX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-29T08:15:33.247+0000)
>
> Sorry for your loss, I imagine it must be quite difficult. If you're ever in need of help I'm sure the community would be more than willing to provide.
> 
> But on to your question, the best place to report stuff like that is through a [player support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I don't know if the situation with your mother will play any part in the judgement of the ban though, that's something you'll have to ask player support yourself.

this community would offer nothing but scorn, not best people to say to ask.
It would be very disappointing if the community acted scornfully towards someone who lost a loved one. I'd probably end up issuing some sort of punishment to a few people if that was the case.

> [{quoted}](name=Tele,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=nihIumoX,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-10-11T06:40:22.069+0000)
>
> It would be very disappointing if the community acted scornfully towards someone who lost a loved one. I'd probably end up issuing some sort of punishment to a few people if that was the case.

its a league community, that's the reality of it. Not saying its right, but it's still going to happen.

i hate it when u ask every one to report that one person and no one dose , the LoL community just takes it. No one seems to be actively reporting any more . like i haven't been sent any of the notifications i would of for people been banned .   and also RIP
kids feel absolutely fanfuckingtastic knowing that they ruined a person's day

It mind boggles me how people have this type of mindset.

How come they've all come to League and not CS:GO or something?

I guess league is the place where it's already become the norm. Like you just go in one side normal and come out the other completely frustrated and wanting to take it out on someone. 

Honestly, i feel i've come out more toxic after my couple years in the community and i think i'm quite right. From experience, newer/casual players are a lot nicer. I'm not sure how psychology works, but it's very easy to become a troll and some evolve to becoming malicious (like that guy who murdered a ton of people bc no one wanted to be his friend)

Welp it was different for this one though.

He was acting like he's the best at the game, with a very cocky attitude.
Might as well send a cheque their way!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
